subdisciplines.name: Physical oceanography
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical properties of the ocean, including dynamics, circulation, and the interactions with the atmosphere.

subdisciplines.name: Chemical oceanography
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemistry of the ocean, including the composition of seawater, interactions with the atmosphere, and the cycling of nutrients.

subdisciplines.name: Biological oceanography
subdisciplines.description: The study of the biology of organisms in the ocean, including their distribution, abundance, and interactions with the environment.

subdisciplines.name: Geological oceanography
subdisciplines.description: The study of the geology of the ocean floor, including plate tectonics, seafloor spreading, and the formation of underwater features.
